entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow at times. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Monday 10 April 2023
